Oct. 6, 1900 D Royal South Street Eisteddfod (A Grade)
Royal South Street Eisteddfod (A Grade) 10 Other Royal South Street Eisteddfod royal-south-street-eisteddfod
A Grade
Set Test and Own Choice
Ballarat, Victoria, Australia Billed as the Grand Intercolonial Band Contest For the Victorian State Band Championships Ungraded contest CONDITIONS Reed Instruments permitted (3rd Battalion Launceston only band to include reed instruments) No Drums or Cymbals No less than 16 or more that 24 players Each band to play 2 selections or 1 selection & 1 overture No.1 Selection points listed under Test No.2 Selection points listed under Own Choice
June 7, 2016, 11:38 p.m. March 9, 2020, 12:28 a.m.
